content.description:
PERCENTAGE WHO ALWAYS VOTE IDEOLOGICALLY

Source: Pew Research Center, 2014.
content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Use the bar graph to answer the following questions.

Describe the percentage of those who identify as “mostly conservative” who always vote.

Describe a trend in the data.

Draw a conclusion to explain that trend.

Explain how public policy is affected by the trend in the bar graphs.
